attributes.action: Award mothers who worked and paid reduced NS contributions a full state pension
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mothers who worked part time, as well as looking after their children are being denied a full state pension unjustly because they paid reduced NS contributions. 
If they had done nothing but stay at home they would now be receiving a full pension  
Why, because they worked to help their families are they being discriminated against?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
